opening: Welcome to the Internal Accounts interview. Please introduce yourself.

role_intro_gate.question: Before we begin, can you explain what you understand about the role of {role} at Knowcraft?
role_intro_gate.end_if_no: Thank you for your time. Our team will be contact you.

questions.text: Have you worked on basic accounting tasks such as ledger posting or bookkeeping?
How many years of experience do you have working with accounting tasks?
questions.note: Captured for reporting only. Not used for rejection.

questions.text: Have you assisted someone else with accounting work or completed relevant training?
What accounting principles are important to ensure accurate financial records?
followups: How do you avoid posting errors?
What checks do you perform before closing books?

questions.text: Do you have exposure to GST, TDS, or other statutory compliances?
Which tax compliances have you worked on, and what was your role?
How would you prepare yourself to handle tax compliance responsibilities?
Have you used any accounting software such as SAP, Tally, Zoho, or QuickBooks?
Which tools have you used and what tasks did you perform on them?
How would you quickly learn a new accounting system if required?
Can you explain the process of bank reconciliation?
followups: What common mismatches do you encounter?
How do you resolve unreconciled entries?

questions.text: What types of management or MIS reports have you helped prepare?
followups: How do you ensure data accuracy in reports?

questions.text: How do you coordinate with other departments for invoice or payment processing?
followups: How do you follow up on pending information?
How do you handle urgent payment requests?

questions.text: Why are internal controls important in an accounting function?
followups: Can you give an example of a control you have seen?
How would weak controls impact the organization?
